results.title: Simvastatin Inhibits NLRP3 Inflammasome Activation and Ameliorates Lung Injury in Hyperoxia-Induced Bronchopulmonary Dysplasia via the KLF2-Mediated Mechanism
results.text_hl: Compared with that of the @<m>DISEASE_Hyperoxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018496 @@@hyperoxia@@@ group, RAC of the @<m>DISEASE_Hyperoxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018496 @@@hyperoxia@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group increased, while MLI and MAD decreased.

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates lung functional and vascular effects of hyperoxia in preterm rabbits.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ attenuates lung functional and vascular effects of @<m>DISEASE_Hyperoxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018496 @@@hyperoxia@@@ in preterm @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@.
